name: Zalando
blurb: Zalando is Europe’s leading online fashion platform, with more than 16 million customers in 15 countries. Our department has built most of our platform in-house, using open source and cutting-edge technologies such as Scala, Cassandra, Clojure, and React.js. We work in small, agile, autonomous teams and follow principles that enable us to produce the most delightful shopping experiences possible.
